sentences.en: By all accounts, Rodger would appear to be a fine fellow.
sentences.cn: 据说，罗杰是个好小伙。

sentences.en: Eddie was a short squat fellow in his forties with thinning hair.
sentences.cn: 埃迪四十多岁，矮矮胖胖的，头发日渐稀疏。

sentences.en: Even in jail, my fellow inmates treated me with kindness.
sentences.cn: 就算在监狱里，狱友们对我也很友善。

sentences.en: fellow members / citizens / workers
sentences.cn: 同一组织的成员/ 同胞 / 同事

sentences.en: He crossed out "fellow subjects", and instead inserted "fellow citizens".
sentences.cn: 他删掉fellowsubjects，插入替换词fellowcitizens。

sentences.en: He denounced the decision to invite his fellow archbishop to preach.
sentences.cn: 他痛斥了邀请其他大主教同仁布道的决定。

sentences.en: He lost last year's final to fellow countryman Michael Stich.
sentences.cn: 他在去年的决赛中输给了自己的同胞迈克尔·施蒂希。

sentences.en: He stood out in terms of competence from all his fellows.
sentences.cn: 他在能力方面比他所有同事都突出。

sentences.en: He was a nice fellow, very quiet and courteous.
sentences.cn: 他是个好小伙，非常温和，彬彬有礼。

sentences.en: He was a tall, thin fellow with a slight stoop.
sentences.cn: 他是个瘦高个儿，有点驼背。

sentences.en: He was disconcerted to find his fellow diners already seated.
sentences.cn: 他很窘迫地发现和他一起就餐的其他人已经入座了。

sentences.en: Her independence of spirit marked her out from her male fellow officers.
sentences.cn: 她的独立精神使她有别于共事的男性军官。

sentences.en: His fellow students had found him too ingratiating.
sentences.cn: 他的同学们发现他太爱奉承了。

sentences.en: Jim Browne is the kind of fellow who can fight dirty.
sentences.cn: 吉姆·布朗是那种打起架来不择手段的家伙。

sentences.en: Of course, Toby, my dear fellow, of course.
sentences.cn: 当然，托比，我亲爱的朋友，当然。

sentences.en: Paul’s an easy-going sort of fellow.
sentences.cn: 保罗人很随和。

sentences.en: Sampras looks set to play his fellow countryman Agassi in the final.
sentences.cn: 桑普拉斯好像注定要在决赛中遇上他的同胞阿加西。

sentences.en: She discovered to her pleasure, a talent for making her fellow guests laugh.
sentences.cn: 她高兴地发现一个把她同来的客人逗笑的本事。

sentences.en: We all have obligations to our fellow men.
sentences.cn: 我们每个人都对人类负有责任。

sentences.en: We watched our fellow students saunter into the building.
sentences.cn: 我们看着同学们悠闲地走进了大楼。

sentences.en: Wooderson’s courage earned him the respect of his fellows.
sentences.cn: 伍德森的勇气赢得了同事的尊敬。

words.tran_cn: 友谊；奖学金；研究员职位

phrases.tran_cn: 同学；（美）领取奖学金的研究生
n. 热诚而令人感到亲切的人

trans.tran_en: You use fellow to describe people who are in the same situation as you, or people you feel you have something in common with

trans.tran_cn: 男人，同事，（学术团体）会员，（学校）董事，（接受奖学金的）研究生
trans.tran_en: people that you work with, study with, or who are in the same situation as you

trans.tran_cn: 使…与另一个对等；使…与另一个匹敌
